snippet.title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms gameplay (PC Game, 1985)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Romance of the Three Kingdoms, Dos PC game produced by KOEI in 1985 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/romance-of-the-three-kingdoms/4279/
Romance of the Three Kingdoms  is an excellent strategy game, with excellent battle-controls and a really magnificent political system.The action takes place in China, and carries a battle between clans. The game supports multiplayer up to 12 players.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Day of The Pharaoh - Nil The Living God - https://youtu.be/HRje3y-buIs
Joan of Arc: The Siege And The Sword - https://youtu.be/I2x5LO_zbwg
Gold of the Americas - https://youtu.be/izUlaorwJVA
